meaningMnemonic: The <radical>spear</radical> radical and the <kanji>spear</kanji> kanji are the same!
readingMnemonic: You take this <kanji>spear</kanji> and stab it into a cow. "<reading>MOO</reading> (む)!" it cries. The cow bites the spear out of your hands and stabs you back. "MOO!" you scream.
